given.text:
Words simply can't express how lucky I feel to have worked alongside Stephen. He is truly one of the kindest and brightest individuals I've had the pleasure of calling my colleague. Stephen's analytical and strategic skills are perfectly balanced with his creativity and communication prowess. He is always smiling, always helping, always making things bigger and better. Stephen's presence and guidance supported me on a daily basis and he was integral to my and our team's achievements. When Stephen announced he was leaving our company I was simultaneously heartbroken and happy, it would simply be selfish to deny others the privilege of collaborating with Stephen. I miss seeing him every day but know that wherever life takes him, and whatever he's working on, countless people are benefiting as a result of knowing Stephen Haskell.
…
See more

Stephen is an incredible talent. During his time at IfOnly, Stephen completely changed how our company not only designed and merchandised our offerings, he elevated our offerings through his unrelenting creativity and drive. Stephen's attention to detail is balanced with his focus on the "big picture" resulting in some of the best work to grace our platform. Beyond his abilities, Stephen is one of the most enjoyable people to work with. He is collaborative, while artfully pushing the team towards clear end goals. He is the total package and someone I look forward working with again.
…
See more

Stephen is a powerhouse with the positivity and willingness to to climb mountains that seem impossible. He was our merchandise lead, physical products owner, site brand specialist and leader of special projects all at the same time, all while executing flawlessly and driving significant revenue for IfOnly. Stephen is a team player, always partnering with other cross functional groups to ensure the full picture was always evaluated for projects. I am so pleased to have worked with Stephen. He came to us highly recommended and that was an understatement!
…
See more

received.text: I had the absolute pleasure of working with Carrie at IfOnly as she launched the culinary marketplace for the platform.  Carrie is a force of nature: a passionate, self-motivated, and diligent team player who will do whatever it takes to get the job done.  She brings a positive attitude and tremendous experience to every challenge -- and for that reason, is able to work well with everyone.  Her action-oriented, results-driven mindset sets the bar high.  On top of that, she is a pleasure to work with and brings just the right amount of humor and fun to the work place.  Any company would be lucky to have her.

Sean is a wildly creative big thinker who works tirelessly and strategically.  He has vision, passion and the appropriate amount of humor to get a job done.  He understands the nuances of working with internal and external partners, building loyalty and strong relationships across the board.
